com.googlecode.csse460_2010.client
Interface UIFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
GUI, TUI
public interface UIFactory

This is a factory class which handles the user interface.

Author:
Christopher Rabotin

errMsg

void errMsg(java.lang.String msg)
This method is called to show an error message to the user.

Parameters:
msg - the message which is to be shown to the user

getNSendCmdInput

void getNSendCmdInput(java.lang.String title)
This method is called to get and write on socket the command input by the user. To write on the client socket, use Client.sendOnSkt(String).

Parameters:
title - the title of the input message

getUserGlbInput

java.lang.String getUserGlbInput(java.lang.String title,
                                 boolean mandatory)
This method is called to get normal input.

Parameters:
title - the title of the input message
Returns:
the user's input
